biotools.summary: Longitudinal Automatic Segmentation of Hippocampal Subfields (LASHiS) using Multi-Contrast MRI | LASHiS was loosely adapted from the ANTs Longitudinal Cortical Thickness pipeline https://github.com/ANTsX/ANTs/ The ASHS_TSE image slice direction should be z. In other words, the dimension of ASHS_TSE image should be 400x400x30 or something like that, not 400x30x400

bioschemas.name: LASHiS

In other words, the dimension of ASHS_TSE image should be 400x400x30 or something like that, not 400x30x400
